/** @format */ import * as React from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { setProductos } from "../store/productos"; import axios from "axios"; import { ListGroup } from "react-bootstrap"; import "../assets/index.css"; export default function Sidebar() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const handleFilter = (categoryId) => { let productArr = [] axios .get(`/api/products?categoryId=${categoryId}`) .then((res) => res.data) .then((data) => { Promise.all(data.map(arrData => axios.get(`/api/products?id=${arrData.productId}`) .then((datas) => productArr.push(datas.data)))) .then(() => dispatch(setProductos(productArr)))}) }; return (
Categor√≠as
); }
